page.title: 09SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: A big concern was unemployment "The dole is just enough to keep us happy." said one man.Most people see the job situation getting worse before it gets better.Most people thought that smoking was a very expensive habit which was bad for your health.People all agreed that there was far too much famine and it was a very sad situation .Most people disliked pollution and I.C.I. Wilton provided an awful lot of the pollution in the area.Despite spending over 1 million pounds a year on pollution control Lazonby village was a smokeless area as one person complained."It's not fair,here we are smokeless and there's all those fumes coming from I.C.I. Wilton."In the area people wanted things such as hospitals,youth clubs and more shops,they all felt that these would make the villages better places.
